content.data: Click on the Tabs in the image below for additional information
This field is intended to be an additional amount added to the Door Price per Door.
This field is intended to be an additional percentage that is added to the Door Price.
Enter the tallest desired Drawer Height.
Include Door Catalog Cost In Upcharge

This option enables you to include the Door Cost in the upcharge for the Door. This allows for any aspect of Door Catalog pricing, including Door Matrix pricing. If checked this value will be added to the Upcharge for that Door/Drawer Front.
This button clears all of the prices for the selected Door across all of the categories (Price, Outer, Inner, RP Detail, Route Ptrn, Material)
This button clears the prices for the selected Door in the current category only.
